title: Rams vs. Chiefs MNF Shootout (2018)

questions.context: A highly anticipated Monday Night Football game with massive offensive expectations.

questions.text: Patrick Mahomes zips a pass over the middle to Tyreek Hill for a touchdown
Samson Ebukam scoops up a fumble and returns it for a Rams touchdown
Mahomes finds Travis Kelce in the end zone after escaping pressure
Allen Bailey recovers a fumble by Jared Goff, setting up a Chiefs scoring drive
Tyreek Hill outruns the secondary on a deep touchdown from Mahomes; Goff answers with a strike to Gerald Everett
Lamarcus Joyner jumps a sideline route and picks off Mahomes to halt a late drive
Goff hits Gerald Everett in stride on a sideline throw that turns into a touchdown

questions.context: Rams win a thriller 54-51.

title: Colts vs. Patriots '4th & 2' Game (2009)

questions.context: A late-season matchup between undefeated Colts and the Patriots.

questions.text: Tom Brady fires a dart to Randy Moss in tight coverage for a Patriots touchdown
Peyton Manning threads a touchdown pass to Pierre Garçon between two defenders
Joseph Addai powers into the end zone through a crowded interior
Patriots keep the offense on the field on a short-yardage situation near their own territory
Kevin Faulk catches a short pass and is immediately wrapped up near the sticks
Manning connects with Reggie Wayne on a crossing route for the go-ahead touchdown

questions.context: Colts complete the comeback win 35-34 after the failed 4th down try.

title: Vikings vs. Saints Wild Card OT (2020)

questions.context: A tense NFC Wild Card matchup.

questions.text: Dalvin Cook powers through contact and stretches across the goal line for a touchdown
Taysom Hill slips behind the defense and hauls in a touchdown pass on a deep shot
Saints cap a long drive with a clutch field goal to keep the game alive
Minnesota wins the overtime coin toss and takes the ball
Kirk Cousins launches a deep ball to Adam Thielen, who makes a contested grab downfield
Kyle Rudolph fends off tight coverage and high-points a fade route in the end zone

questions.context: Vikings upset the Saints 26-20 in overtime.

title: Jets vs. Browns (Mayfield Debut Comeback) (2018)

questions.context: The Browns sought their first win in 635 days.

questions.text: Tyrod Taylor exits the game after taking a hit while scrambling
Baker Mayfield enters and completes back-to-back passes to spark the crowd
On a trick play, Mayfield hauls in a two-point conversion pass on a Philly Special-style play
Carlos Hyde bursts through the middle and dives across the goal line
Terrance Mitchell snags a Darnold pass on a diving interception to seal the win

questions.context: Browns win 21-17, snapping the long winless streak.

title: Packers vs. Cowboys Divisional (Cook Toe-Tap) (2017)

questions.context: A back-and-forth NFC Divisional playoff game.

questions.text: Aaron Rodgers hits Richard Rodgers in the end zone to extend Green Bay's lead
Dak Prescott connects with Dez Bryant on a deep strike as Dallas claws back
Rodgers escapes pressure and flings a strike toward the sideline on a desperation heave
Jared Cook drags his toes while fully extending to secure a sideline catch
Mason Crosby drills a long field goal off his right foot as defenders bear down

questions.context: Packers win 34-31 on a last-second field goal.

title: USA vs. Algeria World Cup (Donovan Goal) (2010)

questions.context: USA needed a win to advance from the World Cup group stage.

questions.text: A US goal is waved off as the assistant referee raises the flag for offside
Tim Howard grabs a loose ball and launches a pinpoint throw to start a counter attack
Both teams miss chances as the scoreless deadlock continues late into the match
Clint Dempsey's low shot is deflected by the keeper and the rebound stays in play
Landon Donovan sprints into the box and calmly puts away a rebound into the net

questions.context: USA wins 1-0 and dramatically tops the group.

title: France vs. Argentina (2018) – World Cup Knockout Classic

questions.context: France and Argentina trade heavy punches in a World Cup knockout thriller.

questions.text: Griezmann draws contact at the edge of the box and calmly converts from the spot
Di María rifles a left-footed shot from distance that swerves into the top corner
Mercado redirects a shot that wrong-foots the keeper and gives Argentina the lead
Pavard strikes a spinning volley from the right wing that curls past the outstretched keeper
Mbappé controls a loose ball in the box and slides a low shot under the goalkeeper
Mbappé finishes a sweeping team move by tucking a left-footed shot inside the near post

questions.context: France holds off a late surge to eliminate Argentina in a seven-goal spectacle.

title: Croatia vs. Russia (2018) – Extra Time and Penalty Drama

questions.context: A World Cup quarterfinal that pushed both sides to the brink.

questions.text: Cheryshev cuts inside and curls a left-footed rocket into the top corner
Kramarić glances a header beyond the keeper after a looping cross from the left
Vida rises above the crowd and heads in a corner during a chaotic sequence
Fernandes nods home a free kick from the right flank to bring it level again
Subašić stretches low to his left to deny a penalty in the shootout
Rakitić slots the final spot kick inside the post as the keeper guesses wrong

questions.context: Croatia advances after a nerve-wracking shootout win.

title: Portugal vs. Spain (2018) – Ronaldo’s Hat Trick

questions.context: A legendary performance on the biggest group stage.

questions.text: Ronaldo earns a penalty after drawing contact at the edge of the box and buries it low
Costa backs down a defender and rifles a shot past Rui Patrício
Ronaldo whips a low shot under the keeper after a slick give-and-go
Nacho meets a bouncing ball with a strike off the post and in
Costa scores again by pouncing on a loose ball in the box
Ronaldo curls a free kick around the wall and into the top corner to complete the hat trick

questions.context: Portugal and Spain split points in one of the greatest group stage games ever.

title: Giants vs. Reds NLDS Game 5 (2012) – Series-Clinching Finish

questions.context: The series comes down to a winner-take-all Game 5 with late-inning tension building pitch by pitch.

questions.text: Buster Posey launches a grand slam that clanks off the foul pole in right
The Reds chip away with a rally capped by a two-run single to left
Brandon Crawford makes a diving stop to start a double play and kill momentum
Sergio Romo takes the mound with runners aboard and one out
Marco Scutaro squeezes a sky-high popup near second base to end the game

questions.context: The Giants punch their ticket to the NLCS after surviving a tense ninth inning.

title: Kings vs. Blackhawks WCF Game 7 OT (2014)

questions.context: Game 7 of the Western Conference Final between two dynasties.

questions.text: Chicago takes early 2-goal lead
Kings tie game in 2nd period
Blackhawks go up 4-3 entering 3rd period
Kings force OT with goal in final minutes
Alec Martinez scores series-winning goal in OT

questions.context: Kings win 5-4 and advance to the Stanley Cup Final.

title: Blue Jackets Sweep Lightning Game 1 Comeback (2019)

questions.context: The Presidents' Trophy-winning Lightning face the underdog Blue Jackets.

questions.text: Tampa Bay jumps out to 3-0 lead
Blue Jackets get first goal late in 2nd period
Jones scores PPG to tie game 3-3
Texier adds insurance goal

questions.context: Columbus stuns Tampa Bay with 4-3 comeback win.

title: Penguins vs. Flyers Game 3 Fight-Fest (2012)

questions.context: A heated Game 3 between bitter rivals in the playoffs.

questions.text: Flyers take early lead
Multiple fights break out after cheap shots
Penguins score shorthanded but still trail big
Game finishes with 158 total penalty minutes

questions.context: Flyers win 8-4 and take a 3-0 series lead.

title: Flames vs. Oilers Battle of Alberta (2022)

questions.text: Flames score 3 goals in opening minutes
Oilers answer with goals from McDavid & Draisaitl
Flames and Oilers combine for 11 goals through two periods
Calgary wins high-scoring shootout

questions.context: Flames take Game 1, 9-6, in a wild opener.

title: Golden Knights vs. Sharks Game 7 Collapse (2019)

title: Mariners vs. Yankees (Ichiro Inside-the-Park HR) (2007)

Ball takes weird carom past Griffey Jr.
Ichiro rounds third and scores standing

Kansas begins late full-court press and rally
Memphis misses key free throws
Mario Chalmers hits game-tying 3-pointer
Kansas dominates overtime period

title: Michigan State vs. Michigan Punt Mishap (2015)
